title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Export volume in thousand metric tons.
The highest category is found at EU where Export volume in thousand metric tons is 3900.0.
The lowest category is found at China where Export volume in thousand metric tons is 100.0.
gold: This statistic depicts the forecast export volume of pork worldwide in 2020 , by leading country . The estimated pork exports of the United States were amounted to approximately 3.22 million metric tons in 2020 .
